meanings.definition: A cord or string used to fasten a mask or eyeglasses around the head.
meanings.sent1: I always make sure my eyeglasses are secure with the eyestring.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted her mask, ensuring the eyestring was snug.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the eyestring for a tasty snack.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the eyestring that held her focus in place.
meanings.sent5: The bright red eyestring contrasted beautifully with her blue mask.

meanings.definition: A string or cord used to secure a horse's blinders.
meanings.sent1: The horse trotted confidently with the eyestring holding the blinders.
meanings.sent2: The stable hand checked the eyestring before the race.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous foal tried to nibble on the eyestring playfully.
meanings.sent4: The eyestring acted as a silent guide for the horse's focus.
meanings.sent5: The eyestring kept the blinders in place, allowing the horse to see only ahead.

meanings.definition: A string or cord used to fasten a hat under the chin.
meanings.sent1: Her sun hat stayed put thanks to the eyestring under her chin.
meanings.sent2: The wind threatened to blow away the hat without the secure eyestring.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy tugged on the eyestring, trying to play a game.
meanings.sent4: The eyestring was like a gentle hug keeping the hat in place.
meanings.sent5: The colorful beads on the eyestring added a fun touch to her hat.
